snippet.title: I Am Your Beast - Official Announcement Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the tense, brutal reveal trailer for I Am Your Beast, an upcoming short-form covert revenge thriller and first-person shooter game from developer Strange Scaffold (El Paso, Elsewhere, Life Eater, and Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator). I Am Your Beast will be available on PC on August 15 and on iOS on August 28, 2024. A demo will be available as part of Steam Next Fest, taking place June 10-17. 

I Am Your Beast puts players in the shoes of secret agent Alphonse Harding. Retired for six years, you've been asked to complete "one last job" one too many times. Declining your latest mission sets in motion a furious guerilla war between you and the Covert Operations Initiative (COI) that litters the forest with bodies and bullet casings. Now you must break your opponents, use their own equipment against them, duck into your tunnel network before enemy forces zero in on your location… and repeat.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
